title: Global Coal Plant Tracker Dashboard - DRAFT
footer: All data comes from GEM's [Global Coal Plant Tracker](https://globalenergymonitor.org/projects/global-coal-plant-tracker/), last updated in January 2024.

dropdown.overall_summary: **Global** operating coal power capacity increased 2% in 2023.

**Albania** has no operating coal plants. It also has no coal power under development.
**Austria** has retired all its coal plants.
**Belarus** has no operating coal plants. It also has no coal power under development.
**Belgium** has retired all its operating coal plants.
**Canada** was one of 10 countries that decreased its operating capacity in 2023.
**Chile** was one of 10 countries that decreased its operating capacity in 2023.

**China** ranks first in terms of operating coal power capacity and was one of 10 countries that increased its operating capacity in 2023. It also has 70% of the world's coal capacity under consideration.
